page.title: 03ATTITUDES
page.content: There are three main categories of attitudes held by people in Strathaven towards Nuclear Weapons. 1)Those who believe they are neccessary to defend our country. 2)Those who have no strong opinions about them. 3)Those who believe we should get rid of them. In a survey in Strathaven 18% said "YES" to Nuclear Weapons----72% said "NO"----10% had no opinion. Some of those asked said they were uneasy about Nuclear Weapons stationed in this country and controlled by another nation. Others felt that although the weapons were undesirable we must have them if other countries, especially possible enemy ones i.e. Russia,had them. Despite the survey result C.N.D. is not especially strong in this area.
